attributes.action: oppose the inclusion in the draft of the Communications Bill 2008 a proposal to create a national database of every phone call and email sent in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Apparently, the Home Office are considering creating a database of every phone call and email sent in the UK. This proposal could be included in the upcoming draft of the Communications Bill. In view of this government's lamentable record on database security and concerns about the civil liberty of every person in the UK, I urge the Prime Minister to oppose adding this to our legislation. Big Brother should be stopped in his tracks now!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
